title: Strategic Operations Associate
job_overview:
Strategic Operations Associate
Location: Remote | Full-Time | Salary + Large Bonus

We're looking for a Strategic Operations Associate to join our team and take ownership of data, automation, and operational efficiency across our commercial real estate and business brokerage companies.

This is a salary + large bonus position, with room for growth as you take on more responsibilities and help shape the future of our operations.

What You’ll Do:

Organize, clean, and structure internal and external data used by our sales and operations teams.

Oversee and manage our full tech stack (CRM, project management tools, AI automation systems).

Spearhead AI automation initiatives across all departments to boost efficiency and consistency.

Research new market data, support with deal underwriting (training available), and assist in building sales packages.

Must-Have Skills — Please do not apply unless you meet all three:

Advanced Excel skills – ability to use pivot tables, nested formulas, VBA/macros, and handle large data sets with ease.

AI automation + coding (advanced) – experience with tools like Zapier, n8n, Make, and/or coding in Python/JavaScript to build custom automations or AI solutions.

Salesforce (intermediate) – comfort mapping/importing/exporting data, managing fields, and keeping records clean and structured.

Compensation:

Competitive base salary

Substantial bonus potential tied to performance and project success
